q1.question: How do you spot AI-generated images?
q1.answer: Look for unnatural textures, inconsistent lighting, strange reflections, distorted hands or faces, impossible geometry, and artifacts in fine details like hair or text. AI-generated images often have subtle imperfections that trained eyes can detect.

q2.question: What is Fakeout game?
q2.answer: Fakeout is a free daily challenge game that tests your ability to distinguish between real photographs and AI-generated images. Each day features new image pairs to sharpen your AI detection skills.

q3.question: How does the AI image detector game work?
q3.answer: You're presented with two images - one real photograph and one AI-generated image. Your goal is to identify which one was created by artificial intelligence. After making your selection, you'll receive immediate feedback and learn what to look for.

q4.question: Can AI-generated images be detected?
q4.answer: Yes! While AI image generation is becoming increasingly sophisticated, there are still telltale signs that can help identify AI-generated content. With practice and knowledge of what to look for, you can improve your detection accuracy.

q5.question: Is Fakeout free to play?
q5.answer: Yes, Fakeout is completely free to play. You can test your AI detection skills daily without any cost or registration required.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Fakeout aims to democratize AI literacy. By turning the detection of synthetic media into a game, we help people train their eyes to spot the subtle imperfections of AI-generated images and videos.

story.title: The Story
story.text: Started as a small experiment in 2024, Fakeout has grown into a daily challenge for thousands of users who want to stay ahead of the curve in the age of generative AI.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: Welcome to Fakeout. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our AI image detection game.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.text: We collect the following types of information:

items.localStorage: Game progress and statistics stored locally in your browser (localStorage)
items.analytics: Anonymous usage data through Google Analytics (page views, session duration, device type)
items.cookies: Cookies for functionality, analytics, and advertising purposes

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience on our site.
cookies.thirdParty: Third-party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites.
cookies.googleInfo: Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to you based on your visit to our site and/or other sites on the Internet.
cookies.googleLink: Learn how Google uses data when you use our site
cookies.optOut: You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting:

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: We use the following third-party services that may collect data:
thirdParty.googleAdsense: Advertising services to support our free game

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: Under GDPR and similar regulations, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right to access your personal data
items.erasure: Right to request deletion of your data
items.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent at any time

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.text: Fakeout is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using Fakeout, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: Service Description
description.text: Fakeout is a free online game that challenges users to distinguish between real photographs and AI-generated images. The game is provided for entertainment and educational purposes.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.text: When using Fakeout, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use the service only for lawful purposes
items.noHarm: Not attempt to harm, disrupt, or exploit the service
items.noInterference: Not interfere with other users' enjoyment of the service
items.noAutomation: Not use automated systems or bots to interact with the service

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.text: All content on Fakeout, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Fakeout or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws. The images used in the game are sourced from licensed stock photography and AI generation tools.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.text: Fakeout is provided 'as is' without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. The game results are for entertainment purposes only and should not be relied upon for any professional AI detection needs.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.text: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Fakeout shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.text: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to conflict of law principles.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Choose the best way to reach us.

email.title: General Inquiries
email.description: For general questions, feedback, or suggestions about Fakeout.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Having issues with the game? Report bugs or technical problems.

business.title: Business Inquiries
business.description: For partnerships, advertising, or business opportunities.

privacy.title: Privacy Concerns
privacy.description: Questions about your data or privacy-related requests.

social.title: Follow Us
social.description: Stay updated with the latest news and updates from Fakeout.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Get notified when new daily challenges are available.

errors.general: Something went wrong. Please try again.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide you with the best experience. Some cookies are necessary for the site to function, while others help us improve your experience and show personalized content and ads.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation and access to secure areas.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: These cookies are used to deliver relevant ads and track ad campaign performance across websites.
